properties.entry: INSERT INTO CONTENTS ( CNT_NO , CNT_TITLE , CNT_CONTENT , CNT_THUMBNAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNTNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_TYPE , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILENO.NEXTVAL , 3 , SEQ_CNTNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT CNT_NO , CNT_TITLE , CNT_ENROLL_DATE , CNT_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONTENTS_LIKE CL WHERE CL.CNT_NO = C.CNT_NO) AS CNT_LIKE FROM CONTENTS C WHERE CNT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CNT_NO DESC
UPDATE CONTENTS SET CNT_COUNT = CNT_COUNT+1 WHERE CNT_NO = ? AND CNT_STATUS = 'Y'
